sentences.sContent: He felt elated and mildly drunk.
sentences.sCn: 他感到欢欣鼓舞，而且喝得有点醉了。

synos.tran: 兴高采烈的；得意洋洋的

remMethod.val: e + lat(放) + ed → 放出(高兴神态) → 得意洋洋的

trans.tranCn: 兴高采烈的, 得意洋洋
trans.tranOther: extremely happy and excited, especially because of something that has happened or is going to happen
